author: bsunanda
body:
Extend the endcap fsat timing layer to have a larger solid angle coverage. 
Data format modified to accommodate both barrel and endcap parts
Geometry files modified to accommodate specpar parameters required for Reco geometry and numbering scheme. Accordingly the configuration is changed
Two different simhit collections for barrel and endcap part - need change in the Oscar producer
Appropriate change in handling hits in sensitive detector class
Removal of obsolete xml files for FastTiming studies
title: bsunanda:Phase2-FT07 Simulation of the Fast Timing Layers
